messages.subject: Checking on Ebay seller
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all - Thanks for the many interesting replies. Have passed this on to my friend here in town who is, as advised, running the the other direction... Ron STL
messages.messageBody:
Hi all -

Thanks for the many interesting replies. Have passed this on to my friend here in town who is, as advised, running the the other direction...

Ron
STL

messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Checking on Ebay seller
messages.msgSnippet: Ron, I have a feeling this gentlemans name came up a couple of months ago. Is he a translator trying to sell a sword for a few hundred dollars to fund a trip
messages.messageBody:
Ron,
I have a feeling this gentlemans name came up a couple of months ago. Is he a translator trying to sell a sword for a few hundred dollars to fund a trip to spain or the like? If so I have received unsolicited mail from him and its a scam. Please be very careful.

Ron Hartmann <swords@...> wrote:
Hi all -

Anybody familiar with an Ebay seller from Poland, a Mr. Nowak? Pawvel T. Nowak? Just curious. So much "checking" these days, I can't recall if he has been mentioned or not. Thanks.

One other question...is Toren Smith on any of these discussion groups? Name sounds familiar but...

Privately is fine: swords@...

Ron
STL

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
